name: Fairgame$
description: Welcome to Fairgame$ - your chance to rob the rich and rebalance the scales. Fairgame$ is a competitive modern heist game where you team up to break into exotic locations and steal the cargo. The twist? You not only need to outsmart guards and security systems - you also compete against other teams. Crews that extract with the most loot and flair might just rise to the top of Fairgame$. Take it 'til you make it - who will you recruit first for your crew?
